name: Course on P-Block Group 15
description: In this course, Piyush Maheshwari will cover P-Block Group 15. All the topics will be discussed in detail and would be helpful for all aspirants preparing for IIT JEE exam. Learners at any stage of their preparation would be benefited from the course. The course will be taught in Hinglish and notes will be provided in English.

value.title: Preparation And Properties Of DInitrogen And Ammonia
Preperation And Properties Af Oxides And Oxo-Acids Of Nitrogen
Oxide & Oxo-acids Of Phosphorous & Doubt Clearing Session

author.bio: A mentor to AIR 1, four 100 percentilers in JEE Mains and a guiding light to 10k+ IITians- all of these add to his exceptional achievements.
